articles.description: Erling Haaland is so good, he now has players asking for his shirt at half-time.
articles.title: 'I'd ask for his jersey myself' - Haaland firing Man City to history

articles.description: Celtic lose a goal and a player early on in a damaging 6-0 Champions League defeat away to Atletico Madrid.
articles.title: Atletico Madrid hit 10-man Celtic for six

articles.description: Newcastle's hopes of reaching the knockout stages of the Champions League are dented as they fall to defeat at Borussia Dortmund.
articles.title: Dortmund dent Newcastle's qualification hopes

articles.description: Where does Australia batter Glenn Maxwell's stunning 201 not out to beat Afghanistan rank among the greatest men's ODI innings?
articles.title: Is Maxwell's 'miracle' the greatest men's ODI innings?

articles.description: Wayne Barnes says people "don't see the human side of refereeing" as he describes the abuse he and his family faced following the World Cup final.
articles.title: 'People don't see the human side of refereeing'

articles.description: Australia's Glenn Maxwell reaches 100 off 76 balls in an attempt to revive their hopes of an unlikely victory over Afghanistan at the Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: Maxwell hits 'extraordinary' century as Australia fight back

articles.description: Caster Semenya tells the BBC she is "not going to be ashamed" of being "different", and will "fight for what is right" amid her ongoing dispute with athletics authorities.
articles.title: Semenya 'not ashamed of being different'

articles.description: Christ Tiehi's late equaliser gives Rotherham a draw against high-flying Ipswich at the New York Stadium.
articles.title: Tiehi strike earns Rotherham draw with Ipswich

articles.description: Barcelona miss out on becoming the first side to reach the Champions League knockout stages as they are narrowly beaten 1-0 by Shakhtar Donetsk.
articles.title: Shakhtar Donetsk stun Barcelona in Hamburg

articles.description: Marcus Rashford returns to the Manchester United squad for the Champions League trip to FC Copenhagen, with manager Erik ten Hag insisting the forward is "committed" to the club.
articles.title: 'Committed' Rashford returns to Man Utd squad
